message: What are critical points to address? I'm thinking of a SEO strategy to create articles about gift certificates, to drive traffic to the site. Should these articles be hosted on a blog on the same domain or hosted on different targeted niche domains (for example, spa gift certificate templates etc), pointing to giftcertificatefactory.com?
providing templates to small businesses for selling/giving gift certificates.

imho, you need to rethink your website layout & contents (especially the top most content - above fold on small screen notebook), the design is fine. if i didn't type in the url myself, i'd pegged your site as a spam / parked domain site.
